obfuscation: No -- of course I ai n't .
original: No--of course I ain't.

obfuscation: Well , I 'll tell you .
original:
Well, I'll tell
you.

obfuscation: I 'm a governess , see ?
original: I'm a governess, see?

obfuscation: I take care of kids for people and teach them things .
original:
I take care of kids for people and learn
them things.

obfuscation: A governess , is it ?
original: A governess, is it?

obfuscation: You must be smart , surely .
original: You must be smart, surely.

obfuscation: But let 's not talk about me .
original: But let's not talk about me.

obfuscation: Tell me about the wreck , like you promised me you would .
original:
Tell me about the wreck, like you
promised me you would.

obfuscation: 'Twas this way , Miss .
original: 'Twas this way, Miss.

obfuscation: Two weeks out we ran into the divil 's own storm , and she sprang wan hell of a leak up for'ard .
original:
Two weeks out we ran into
the divil's own storm, and she sprang wan hell of a leak up for'ard.

obfuscation: The skipper was hoping to make Boston before another blow would finish her , but ten days back we met up with another storm the like of the first , entirely worse .
original:
The skipper was hoping to make Boston before another blow would finish
her, but ten days back we met up with another storm the like of the
first, only worse.

obfuscation: Four days we were in it with green seas raking over her from bow to stern .
original:
Four days we was in it with green seas raking over
her from bow to stern.

obfuscation: That was a terrible time , God help us .
original: That was a terrible time, God help us.

obfuscation: And if 't was n't for me and my great strength , I 'm telling you -- and it 's God 's truth -- there 'd been mutiny itself in the stokehole .
original:
And if 'twasn't for me and my great strength, I'm telling
you--and it's God's truth--there'd been mutiny itself in the stokehole.

obfuscation: 'Twas me held them to it , with a kick to wan and a clout to another , and they not caring a damn for the engineers any more , but fearing a clout of my correct arm more than they 'd fear the sea itself .
original:
'Twas me held them to it, with a kick to wan and a clout to another,
and they not caring a damn for the engineers any more, but fearing a
clout of my right arm more than they'd fear the sea itself.

obfuscation: You did some hard work , made n't you ?
original:
You
did some hard work, didn't you?

obfuscation: I did that !
original: I did that!

obfuscation: I 'm a divil for sticking it away when them that 's weak give up .
original:
I'm a divil for sticking it out when
them that's weak give up.

obfuscation: But a lot good it did anyone !
original: But much good it did anyone!

obfuscation: 'T was a mad , fightin ' scramble in the last seconds with each man for himself .
original:
'Twas a mad,
fightin' scramble in the last seconds with each man for himself.

obfuscation: I disremember how it come about , but there was the four of us in wan boat and when we were raised high on a great wave I took a look about and divil a sight there was of ship or men on top of the sea .
original:
I
disremember how it come about, but there was the four of us in wan boat
and when we was raised high on a great wave I took a look about and
divil a sight there was of ship or men on top of the sea.

obfuscation: Then all the others were drowned ?
original: Then all the others was drowned?

obfuscation: BURKE -- They were , surely .
original: BURKE--They was, surely.

obfuscation: What a terrible end !
original: What a terrible end!

obfuscation: A terrible end for the like of them swabs does live on land , maybe .
original:
A terrible end for the like of them swabs does
live on land, maybe.

obfuscation: But for the like of us does exist roaming the seas , a good end , I 'm telling you -- quick and clane .
original:
But for the like of us does be roaming the seas, a
good end, I'm telling you--quick and clane.

obfuscation: Yes , clean .
original: Yes, clean.

obfuscation: That 's yust the word for -- all of it -- the way it makes me feel .
original:
That's yust the word for--all
of it--the way it makes me feel.

obfuscation: The sea , you mean ?
original: The sea, you mean?

obfuscation: I 'm thinking you have a piece of it in your blood , too .
original:
I'm thinking you have a bit
of it in your blood, too.

obfuscation: Your Old Man was n't entirely a barge rat -- begging your pardon -- all his life , by the cut of him .
original:
Your Old Man wasn't only a barge rat--begging
your pardon--all his life, by the cut of him.

obfuscation: No , he was bo'sun on sailing ships for years .
original: No, he was bo'sun on sailing ships for years.

obfuscation: And all the men on both sides of the family have gone to sea as far back as he remembers , he says .
original:
And all the men on
both sides of the family have gone to sea as far back as he remembers,
he says.

obfuscation: All the women get married sailors , too .
original: All the women have married sailors, too.

obfuscation: Did they , nowadays ?
original: Did they, now?

obfuscation: They had spirit in them .
original:
They had spirit in
them.

obfuscation: It 's entirely on the sea you 'd find rale men with guts is fit to wed with fine , high-tempered girls the like of yourself .
original:
It's only on the sea you'd find rale men with guts is fit to wed
with fine, high-tempered girls the like of
yourself.
